query:
WITH TargetLabel AS (
            SELECT
                l.id AS label_id
            FROM
                email_labels l
            WHERE
                l.link_id = $2
                AND l.provider_label_id = $3
        )
        SELECT
            COUNT(m.id) AS "message_count!"
        FROM
            email_messages m
        JOIN
            email_message_labels ml ON m.id = ml.message_id
        JOIN
            TargetLabel tl ON ml.label_id = tl.label_id
        WHERE
            m.thread_id = $1
            AND m.link_id = $2
